events.title: Mystery Master
events.club: Hindi Literary Association and Cubing Club
events.description: Mystery masters is an event in which you have to solve mystery and puzzles.

events.title: Bear the Bull
events.description: Test your grit and balance on the Mechanical Bull Ride! Hold on tight and see how long you can last as the bull bucks and spins!

events.title: Alpha Leader: The Ultimate Best Manager Challenge
events.description: A thrilling team-based treasure hunt testing students on across business domains.

events.title: Art Therapy 2.0
events.description: Unwind and express yourself at Art Therapy, a relaxing event where you can paint tote bags and canvases. Discover the joy of creativity and the calming power of art. Materials provided—just bring your imagination!

events.title: Detective's Dilemma
events.description: Step into the shoes of a detective and crack the case before time runs out.

events.title: Heist at the Louvre
events.description: Heist at the Louvre is an exciting escape room where participants team up to execute a daring art heist, solving puzzles and uncovering clues inspired by French culture and history.

events.title: Trial of the Immortals
events.description: From thunderous gods to mischievous tricksters, watch as your favorite (or most despised) immortals are put on the stand and judged for their epic deeds (and misdeeds!). Join us to serve some legendary justice in Trial of The Immortals!

events.title: Zumba Party
events.description: An energetic Zumba party to groove and have fun.

events.title: The Riviera Mythology Quiz
events.description: Explore gods, legends, and epic tales from across the world. From ancient myths to timeless folklore, showcase your mastery and be crowned the mythology expert!

events.title: Soap Football
events.club: Rotaract Club and Becoming I Foundation - VIT
events.description: Players of 5 per team come to play football on a soapy platform and have fun.
